documentation.short: A simplistic beginning to providing a standard interface to the mica-family 51-pin bus.
documentation.long: A simplistic beginning to providing a standard interface to the mica-family 51-pin bus. Just provides the PW0-PW7 and Int0-3 digital I/O pins and returns the ADC channel number for the ADC pins. @author David Gay

documentation.short: Provide GeneralIO interfaces for all of the ATmega128's pins.
documentation.long:
Provide GeneralIO interfaces for all of the ATmega128's pins.
@author Martin Turon <mturon@xbow.com>

documentation.short: Component providing access to all external interrupt pins on ATmega128.
documentation.long: Component providing access to all external interrupt pins on ATmega128. @author Martin Turon <mturon@xbow.com>

documentation.short: Internal component of the simplistic mica bus interface.
documentation.long: Internal component of the simplistic mica bus interface. @author David Gay
